G-229 G-Block, Sushant Lok-2, Gurugram || Contact no.: +91-8447934555 || Email Id: pragatigautam31@gmail.com

CAREER OBJECTIVE
I want to be an asset for the organization by exhibiting my professional competency to the zenith, so that
my efforts will help the organization achieve its vision while keeping its culture and values intact.

EXPERIENCE

SENIOR ANALYST- IMPLEMENTATION (ETL Developer)
(Mercer India Pvt. Ltd | Jul 2018 – Present)

Mercer is a global consulting leader helping clients around the world advance the health, wealth and careers of their
most vital asset their people. The role is to:

Ø Develop all data warehouse models and prepare reports for all meta data integration into systems and draft all
ETL scripts and prepare required reports for all end users.

Ø Collaborate with all developers and business users to gather required data and execute all ETL programs and
scripts on systems and implement all data warehouse activities and prepare reports for same.

Ø Design and implement all types of reporting files such as 834 files, non-834 files, CSV files, delimited files
and Excel files using Data Integrator.

Ø To create report to develop Communication through ETL Tool. (PEW, CS and LA)
Ø Develop and perform tests on all ETL codes for system data and analyze all data and design all data mapping

techniques for all data models in systems.
Ø Perform root cause analysis on all processes and resolve all production issues and validate all data and

perform routine tests on databases and provide support to all ETL applications.
Ø Importing preexisting client data, designing interfaces, modifying metrics and creating custom reports as per

client requirement.
Ø Document all unit test procedures for systems and processes and coordinate with business analysts and users

to resolve all requirement issues and maintain quality for same.
Ø Optimize the SQL queries to provide filtered and accurate data to generate reports.
Ø Having functional knowledge of US Health Domain and Oracle SQL Developer.

ASSOCIATE- NETWORK RECORDS (Records Analysis and Modelling)
(British Telecom | Nov 2015 – Jul 2017)

BT is a global communications service company that fulfills need of the customers in more than 170 countries
worldwide. Its main objective is Network Infrastructure network IT services, broadband Mobile & TV. The role
was to:
Ø Maximize performance and business delivery in line with team objective and individual contribution.
Ø Update Network Inventory database so as to effectively utilize the Network inventories.
Ø To be fully conversant and able to record /update systems e.g. PIPeR, Network inventory DB System,

LLUMS which reflect Physical Network Records.
Ø To fetch network inventory data using SQL queries and populate the data sets in Excel and CSV files to

publish reports to help the recording team.
Ø Creating dashboards, reports and presentation for huge Inventory data.
Ø Create Excel reports at various level as per business requirements.
Ø A team player with strong communication, analytical, organizational and relationship management skills.
Ø Successful track record in accomplishing assigned projects within agreed cost and time lines.
Ø Involved in Continuous Process Improvement Plans(PIP) and has successfully cut down the time lines for the

various process thus helped in decreasing the SLA’s for the project.



PROJECT

Title New Implementation
Duration July 2018-Present
Description · To fetch huge data using ETL tools and populate data in different types of files

                            to publish reports of carriers.
· To analyze client requirement to make changes in existing Maps per client

 requirement to support Open enrollment process.
· Generated Communication(PEW, CS and LA) to create report  layout that goes

                            to end user.
· Applying functionality of Health and Benefits domain to populate the correct

                            datasets as per Client needs.
Clients CH2M, Cola
Language/Tools Pervasive Data Integrator, Infomaker, Beyond Compare, DJ Map Designer, DJ and

                       DI Scheduler, SQL, VB Script Oracle SQL Developer

Title        Data Mapping
Duration July 2018-Present
Description · Prepare Uploads and Downloads map for Mid-Market Clients.

· Create Data dictionary maps using autobene tools and VB Script.
· Break and fix existing maps to create reports and different files.
· Conversion of Maps from On going to Open Enrollment.

Language/Tools                       Autobene, Test track, SQL VB Script

Title DJ to DI Migration
Duration August 2018-Present

Description
· Profile includes migrations of all jobs and files to new enhanced tool with

Macros i.e. Data Integrator.
· Optimize SQL queries to generate accurate reports and files.
· Unit testing is done to compare the results of old tool and new tool.

Clients CH2M, Midwestern, LGE, Halliburton, Cola, Honda

Language/Tools
DJ Map Designer, Pervasive Data Integrator, Infomaker, Beyond Compare,
SQL, VB Script, Oracle SQL Developer

Title Fibre Network Records Team (LFDC & FTTP)
Duration November 2015 - July 2017
Description · Profile includes maintaining  and analyzing the records of customers of Fibre

Network in UK (approx. 18M customers).
· Planning the network architecture, generating reports for field work and then
analyze data to update the database. Also to create reports using various tools as
per business requirement.

· Updating/Developing various tools/utilities/scripts to automate the
recording process and then updating the database.

· To reflect the changes made in the Inventory database using SQL.
Language/Tools Network Inventory DB, ArcGIS tools- PiPeR, SQL Server 2014,  LLums,

GeoHub, OR-Side, INS, CSS, Data Analysis, Excel

PROFESSIONAL ACHIEVEMENTS

Ø Awarded with Rewards & Recognition (R&R) for the month of June,2016.

 Google Knowledge Graph is the knowledge base used by Google to enhance its search engine results using various research 

techniques, variety of internal tools and complex data curation processes to transform data into knowledge. 
 

 Primary objective of the role is to enhance the ‘Knowledge Panel’ section of Google search results. (Visible on the right hand side 

of the Search Results page; providing graphical & factual information about the searched entity). 
 

 The job-role function resides in the ETL layer (Extract Transform Load) wherein, data from multiple databases are collated; then 

transformed into a common schema and loaded into the destination Data Warehouse. All ETL procedures are coded in SQL. 
 

 Automation of periodic reports and data analysis of key quality parameters. 
 

 Co-ordination with global teams for resolving ad-hoc queries and prioritization of tasks.
